content:
Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
YouTube Privacy Enhanced Shortcode Twitter Simple Shortcode “In addition to being more logical, asymmetry has the advantage that its complete appearance is far more optically effective than symmetry.”
— Jan Tschichold pic.twitter.com/gcv7SrhvJb
— Design Reviewed | Graphic Design History (@DesignReviewed) January 17, 2019 Vimeo Simple Shortcode bilibilibi Shortcode Gist Shortcode Gitlab Snippets Shortcode Quote Shortcode Stack adds a quote shortcode. For example:

title: Rich Content
